entry.title: Doyon LSA520 - Reversible Dough Sheeter - 20" x 78" Conveyor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Dough Sheeter
Price: 14756.00

The Doyon LSA520 can sheet up to 22 pounds dough, with a width of up to 18".  It's suitable for sheeting and stretching many types of doughs: croissant, puffed pastry, danish, flaky pastry, donut, pie, pizza, and more. This efficient sheeter has 20 speeds and reduces labour cost by being able to roll dough faster than rolling by hand. It's perfect for bakeries and commercial kitchens alike. Read the brochure for more information.

      • Forward and reverse action with digital 20 speed control. Ideal for delicate products.
      • Heavy-duty, maintenance-free 3/4 HP motor
      • High precision sheeting, producing more homogeneous dough with a thickness of 1/32" (1mm) to 1/2" (40mm).
      • Sheeting rollers, lower scraper, dough collector and flour container
      • Security bars for accident prevention
      • Wheel mounted with quick locking device and anti-vibration feet
      • Counter-top model with removable and adjustable conveyor; folds up for compact storage and easy cleaning

entry.title: Doyon DL18P - 17" Double Pass Dough Sheeter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Dough Sheeter
Price: 4555.00

The Doyon DL18P can sheet dough from 1 once to 28 ounces, with a diameter of up to 17". It can sheet dough for tortillas, wraps, flat bread, and more. The DL18P is a two-stage sheeter with a front infeed and discharge and produces a uniform thickness. This counter-top dough sheeter features an ergonomic design and a pair of parallel rollers to enable a single operator to make up to 250 pieces in an hour.

Its compact upright design makes it ideal for kitchens with limited space.  This efficient sheeter reduces labor cost by being able to roll dough 6 times faster than rolling by hand. It's perfect for bakeries and commercial kitchens alike and can sheet all types of dough, including cinnamon rolls, doughnuts, pierogis, danish and more.

      • All stainless steel welded construction
      • Heavy-duty, maintenance-free 1/2 HP motor with sealed permanently lubricated ball bearings for trouble-free operation
      • Removable spring loaded scrapers for easy cleaning
      • Sanitary plastic position rollers eliminate dough buildup
      • Quick change index system, simple adjustments for dough thickness
      • Three legs with fitted non-slip rubber boots
      • Recommended for dough with a moisture content of 50-60%

SPECS

Dimensions (WDH) 22.5" x 13" x 32.25"
Max Dough Width 17"
Amps 6
Hertz 60
Phase 1
Voltage 120
Watts 370
HP 1/2
Output 250 pieces per hour
Portion Weight 1 - 28 ounces
Plug Type NEMA 5-15P

WARRANTY

Two year parts, and one year labor limited warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Universe TM-18 - 18" Double Pass Pizza and Pie Dough Sheeter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Universe
Type: Dough Sheeter
Price: 5400.00

The Universe "TM-18" is a double pass dough sheeter suitable for a number of different doughs: pizza dough, roti, pita bread, pie crust, coffee cake, and more. You're going to be able to roll dough with a maximum diameter of 18 inches, with a capacity of about 450 pieces per (with one operator).

The rollers on this machine are very easy to adjust, which will allow the operators to have precise dough thicknesses easily and quickly. Thie TM-18 has been designed with heavy gauge steel and with a powerful 3/4 HP motor, so it will be able to last you for many years to come.

      • Heavy gauge steel is sanitary and easy to clean
      • Rollers are made of hard chromed precision ground
      • Plastic discharge chute
      • Stainless steel chute and receiving tray
      • Smooth painted surface for easy cleaning
      • Roller bearing position on the outside of machine for easy maintenance

entry.title: BakeMax BMFRS03 - Floor Reversible Dough Sheeter - 25" x 95" Conveyor
entry.summary:
Vendor: BakeMax
Type: Dough Sheeter
Price: 9738.00

The BakeMax BMFRS03 is a floor model reversible sheeter with a conveyor dimension of 25" x 95". This sheeter is ideal for sheeting and stretching puff pastry, Danish bread, strudel, marzipan, doughnut, croissant, pie, cookie, and pizza dough.

When you are done using the BakeMax BMFRS03, you are able to fold it up, greatly reducing the amount of space you will need. It is a simple, intuitive machine, which will help you stretch and sheet dough consistently and fast.

      • The head housing is made of heavy duty aluminum.
      • There is safety guard on both sides of the rollers for your protection.
      • With a simple push of a button, you can reverse the direction of the conveyor.
      • Versatility: puff pastry, Danish bread, doughnut dough, croissant dough, pie dough, cookie dough, strudel, marzipan, and pizza dough.

FREE SHIPPING

*This item has free shipping in Canada! Now, some conditions may apply, so please see our shipping policies or contact us for more information.

For instance, even though an item has free shipping, if it weighs over 75 pounds, you may be charged a tailgate fee (unless you have a forklift or a loading dock). Or if you live in a rural or island location, there may be some charges. Otherwise, this item ships free all across Canada!

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

It is a compact machine, which can save you space by allowing you to place it on a a countertop. The BakeMax BMTPS16 has a stainless steel body, infeed and chute. With its adjustable controls, you will easily be able to sheet doughs for pie crusts, pizzas, tortillas, coffee cakes, wraps, and more.
